keyword: how many calories in chicken quesadilla taco bell
title: How Many Calories in Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in chicken quesadilla Taco Bell: about 510 kcal per serving, with full nutrition facts on protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and more tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
assumptions: Standard Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla with grilled chicken, three-cheese blend, and creamy jalapeño sauce; no customizations or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and menu updates. Check Taco Bell app or website for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Taco Bell chicken quesadilla contains about 510 calories and 25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Taco Bell's info.

faqs.q: How many calories in chicken quesadilla Taco Bell?
faqs.a: Approximately 510 calories for one standard serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 25 g of protein per quesadilla.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Around 1240 mg of sodium, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, about 43 g carbs, mostly from the flour tortilla.

faqs.q: Can I make Taco Bell chicken quesadilla lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for fresco style or skip sauce to reduce by 50–120 kcal.
